name: PortalBee
description:
Little Game made during a Student Game Jam, in 24 hours

PortalBee is a 2D Top-Down Defender,
You play as a pair of mechanical bees, protecting the hive from threats using a teleportation portal.
Your goal is to prevent waves of insects to get pass through you, and defend the hive

How to play :

Left Arrow - Right Arrow to move the portal and intercept the insects

Team :

Kyllian Warembourg - Game Design - Programation - Integration

Florian Lefebvre - 2D and 3D artist - Art Direction

Julien Lenoble - Sound Desginer

Lucas Nowottnick - Sound Desginer
